extendedInfo.description: Musket & Artillery (American Revolutionary War) is a strategic style game specially developed for iPhone & iPod touch users. It takes you back to the days of the American Revolutionary War, where you can use military tactics to defeat your enemies (economic mode and war mode are available).You can select to join any of the forces from British, France, United States, Hessen, Germany and Spain which are divided into 2 alliances opposite to each other. You may increase your tax revenues by occupying the territory of your enemy, or you may occupy the enemyâs HQ to get his entire territory. Absolutely, you can construct your territory to receive more taxes.FEATURES:-12 cards (Construction Card, Draft Card, General Card, Marshal Card, Ship Card, Fortress Card, Cannon Fire Card, etc.)- 5 challenge levels.- 5 battles (3 real-happened battles and 2 fictional battles)- Enhanced risk style combat system (easy, direct and interesting) providing comfortable experience and easing your operation.Note:Need Android2.2 or higher.APK may be too large for some device under 2.2.

reviews.title: Touch is off
reviews.comment: In the past this has been a great game,  but now the touch is really off. This sucks now I have to uninstall.. (unless Easytime wakes the hell up and updates this game )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needed update
reviews.comment: Amazing game, but the screen goes black at home page.  If it gets updated then it would be worth the money
reviews.author: Alex Landon

reviews.title: Garbage! !!! !
reviews.comment: I give u 0 stars if i could! !!! Game sux don\'t play right...refund plzzz!

reviews.title: Copy of their previous crappy game

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: \"Game\" doesn\'t go past the start screen on my Asus TF300 even with everything else stopped.  All I get for what I paid is looped music.  Avoid this developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game sucks
reviews.comment: Don\'t download it doesn\'t go vast the start screen on my razor maxx

reviews.title: Great but unfair
reviews.comment: This game is great fun! It\'s a lot like some of my favorite board games. The only issue is that the dice rolls feel really unfair.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game Fuckin Sucks
reviews.comment: don\'t download!!!! The dice are rigged so you will continue to lose!!!

reviews.title: Bad port
reviews.comment: Bought on iphone and figured it would be the same on Android. Does not work properly on galaxy note 2 screen size as button placement doesnt match button image.
reviews.author: Chris Huston
